page.title: 12PRINCIPLE FEATURES
page.content: Dagenham Heathway is a long road lined with small shops either side. It seems as soon as one shop opens another closes down. Some people say this is because of the high rates people have to pay. The Heathway has a bingo club, ballroom and disco dancing and keep-fit. The Barking and Dagenham town show is a big event,each summer people crowd the streets to watch the procession pass into the Central park. It is an important event, in the life of Barking and Dagenham. There is room for improvement in Dagenham, but compared with some other areas we are lucky and should appreciate what we have got.
